org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: echo "Node.js version:" node --version echo "NPM version:" npm --version echo "Docker version:" docker --version
echo "Running ESLint..." npx eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --format compact || true echo "Code analysis completed"
echo "Running Jest tests..." npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false || true echo "Unit tests completed"

def imageName = "${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/${DOCKER_NAMESPACE}/${APP_NAME}" def imageTag = "${DOCKER_TAG}" def latestTag = "latest"
echo "Building image: ${imageName}:${imageTag}"
sh """ docker build -t ${imageName}:${imageTag} . docker tag ${imageName}:${imageTag} ${imageName}:${latestTag} echo "Docker image built successfully" """
env.DOCKER_IMAGE = "${imageName}:${imageTag}" env.DOCKER_IMAGE_LATEST = "${imageName}:${latestTag}"
üì§ Pushing Docker image to Aliyun ACR...
echo "Running health checks..." echo "Running integration tests..." echo "Post-deploy tests completed"
docker system prune -f --volumes || true echo "Cleanup completed"
